core.text: 1: If its not obvious what to do, try pressing F1. 2: If F1 does nothing, look for somthing that says "help" and click on it. 3: Look for any context clues or perhaps check any text on the screen again. 4: Check out any tutroials related to the utility in question. 5: check SBTCVM's users manual. (found in the manual directory) 6: Get help from SBTCVM's online community.
